Androids2.A2GeneDef.label: battery power
Androids2.A2GeneDef.description: The robot's reactor has been swapped to a rechargable battery, needs to be recharged at an android charging station. Quaters max energy capacity

Androids2.A2GeneDef.label: auxillary battery
Androids2.A2GeneDef.description: Doubles the battery capacity of the android

Androids2.A2GeneDef.label: super capacitor
Androids2.A2GeneDef.description: The robot's reactor has been swapped to a super capacitor, allowing the robot to be recharged instantly at a super charger. Reduces max energy capacity by a factor of 10

Androids2.A2GeneDef.label: bio reactor
Androids2.A2GeneDef.description: Allows the robot to recharge by eating normal food. Experience what its like to eat without a table. Less energy efficient than direct charging

Androids2.A2GeneDef.label: chemfuel reactor
Androids2.A2GeneDef.description: Allows the robot to recharge by drinking chemfuel. Just like eating, but with extra steps. More efficient compared to eating food

Androids2.A2GeneDef.label: tox reactor
Androids2.A2GeneDef.description: Allows the robot to recharge by eating wastepacks. Reduce, Reuse, Recycle. Converts wastepacks back into pollution and tox gas
